safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset module¶

Provides MultimodalDataset functionality with underlying ShardedDatasets for both text and images.

class safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.ShardedMultimodalDataset(text_output_prefix, text_vt_filename, img_output_prefix, img_ic_filename, dim_text=None, dim_img=None, textdoc2imdoc=None, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, mode=0, shared=False, text_serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, img_serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, text_mm_filename=None, img_mm_filename=None, shardsize=4096, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.multimodal_dataset.MultimodalDataset

Implements the MultimodalDataset functionality on top of ShardedDataset-like objects for both text and image modality.

Doesn’t re-implement anything but initialization from MultimodalDataset.

Should be always called using a loader.

class safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.UnsupervisedShardedCorpusDataset(output_prefix, dim, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, mm_corpus_filename=None, shardsize=4096, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.corpus_dataset.UnsupervisedCorpusDataset

A version of UnsupervisedCorpusDataset built around a ShardedDataset instead of an IndexedCorpus.

get_sparse(idx)[source]¶
class safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.UnsupervisedShardedImagenetCorpusDataset(output_prefix, ic_corpus_filename, dim=None, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, mm_corpus_filename=None, shardsize=4096, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.UnsupervisedShardedCorpusDataset

Adds VTextCorpus capabilities to UnsupervisedShardedCorpusDataset: in addition to loading a ShardedDatasest and optionally a serialized MmCorpus, it will load a VTextCorpus used to build the MmCorpus-serialized data (and by extension the ShardedDataset). The VTextCorpus is then made available as the vtcorp member of the object.

class safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.UnsupervisedShardedVTextCorpusDataset(output_prefix, vt_corpus_filename, dim=None, test_p=0.1, devel_p=0.1, serializer=<class 'gensim.corpora.mmcorpus.MmCorpus'>, mm_corpus_filename=None, shardsize=4096, overwrite=False)[source]¶

Bases: safire.data.sharded_multimodal_dataset.UnsupervisedShardedCorpusDataset

Adds VTextCorpus capabilities to UnsupervisedShardedCorpusDataset: in addition to loading a ShardedDatasest and optionally a serialized MmCorpus, it will load a VTextCorpus (or a transformation) used to build the MmCorpus-serialized data (and by extension the ShardedDataset). The VTextCorpus is then made available as the vtcorp member of the object.
